name: a Shady Place Shackleton
description:
Dependable, versatile and with a rich and powerful history, the American Felling Axe is the quintessential woodland tool and an icon of American design and ingenuity. Every feature of this axe was meticulously designed by Best Made in New York. 

The Dayton pattern head is made from high carbon American steel and is drop forged in North Carolina by fourth-generation axe makers. The Best Made helve is lathed from Appalachian hickory and its elegant curvature and slender form factor ensure superior efficiency and safety. Every Best Made axe comes numbered with our documentation and guarantee, and a fitted, top-grain leather blade guard. This Special Edition axe will arrive in a hand-built crate with wood wool.

name: Oakley Holbrook Sunglasses (Matte Black/ Warm Grey- RRP £105)
description:
These fantastic sunglasses are in excellent, nearly new condition, and come complete with original Oakley carrying/cleaning pouch.

Holbrook are the hottest new Oakley wayfarer design. 

With his brother Jesse acting as his creative director, snowboarding superstar Shaun White worked closely with Oakley during the creation of HOLBROOK. Together they went back to vintage styles like the original Oakley FROGSKINS then set out to distill their own vision of American cool. HOLBROOK is a timeless classic that echoes the screen heroes from the 1940s, 50s and 60s, the icons who inspired youth with their own brand of defiance. Who was the legend? He was sometimes a loner and sometimes a leader, an everyman who lived by a code, stood up for what was right and did what needed to be done. You wouldn’t call him a man’s man because that macho crap meant nothing to him. What you saw was what you got, including dust from the open road and a look that said he might be gone tomorrow because nothing could hold him.

The name “HOLBROOK” came from a similar inspiration. HOLBROOK is a small town found along historic Route 66 in Arizona that sits on the outskirts of the painted desert and the petrified forest. It’s a classic western badland that epitomizes a spirit of exploration and adventure found in those traveling along Highway 66 in the 50’s and 60’s.

Features:
Frame- Matte Black 
Lens- Warm Grey
Material- Acetate
Hinge- Swing
Released- 2010

Would make a great summer purchase for any Oakley fans or collectors.

If you have any questions or want to know more about these shades, please do get in touch.

name: Ray-Ban Cockpit Aviator Sunglasses (RB3362 Gold RPP- £125)
description:
The glasses are in excellent condition, and come included with the original storage case. 

These fantastic sunglasses are a more contemporary and scaled down version of the Ray-Ban Aviator. The Ray-Ban Cockpit represents the core features of the Aviator but boasts slightly smaller and less prominent lenses, making the Cockpit suitable for a wide range of face shapes and a design that is highly versatile and complimentary when worn with a number of different looks. 

Featuring an incredibly sleek and slim wire frame and wire arms with ear socks, the Ray-Ban signature logo is displayed on the lens and upon the adjustable nose pads which achieve a perfect fit and maximum comfort. 

This is a style that is effortlessly sleek and sophisticated and is the ideal design if you prefer a more understated look that still conveys a chic approach to style.

The Ray-Ban Cockpit is the choice of many celebrities and fashion icons with the style being spotted on the likes of Tom Cruise, Sarah Michelle Gellar and Hayden Panettiere. 
Features: 

•	Frame Colour: Gold.
•	Lens Colour: Green Crystal G15. 
•	Style: Aviator
•	One of the most popular and iconic sunglasses by Ray-Ban.
•	Ray-Ban signature on lens.
•	Case included.
•	Made in Italy.

If you have any questions or want to know more about these shades, please do get in touch.

name: Ray-Ban Wayfarer Sunglasses (RB 2140 - Tortoise Frames RRP- £165)
description:
I’m having a major clear out of my sunglasses collection, and will be sorry to see these fantastic Ray-Ban Wayfarers go.

The glasses are in excellent condition, with no marks on the polarised lenses at all. Also included are the original cleaning cloth, and storage case. 

Ray-Ban Wayfarer RB2140 sunglasses are simply the most recognizable style in the history of sunglasses. The Wayfarer distinct shape is paired with the traditional Ray-Ban signature logo on the sculpted temples. 

After its initial design in 1952, the Ray-Ban Wayfarer quickly endeared itself to Hollywood filmmakers, celebrities, musicians, and artists; solidifying its iconic status for years to come.

Features: 

•	Frame Colour: Tortoise.
•	Lens Colour: Brown. 
•	One of the most popular and iconic sunglasses by Ray-Ban.
•	Ray-Ban signature on lens.
•	Case and cleaning cloth included.
•	Made in Italy.

If you have any questions or want to know more about these shades, please do get in touch.
